Everlight

The city was founded before the Colonies in the New World took hold. It is one of the oldest cities. It is the Supernatural Capital of the world with a thriving night life, 24/7 businesses for everything imaginable. They do not wish to advertise the supernatural aspect of it, but they aren't as hidden as they are throughout the rest of the world. Ponce de Leon did indeed find the fountain of youth here, but it is not what anyone expected as the city was already home to vampires and the fountain of youth is being turned into a vampire for eternity.

Follow Nox and Alex through their adventures in Everlight!

Follow along with us at The Mind of Nox on their first adventure where they try to join the prestigious organization upon which they were raised.
